participant_1.name: Emma

participant_1.background: a already have a step children. i recently moved to this country. i just moved into my first home. i am expecting triplets in three months.

participant_2.background: i'm partly deaf. i grow roses in my garden. i've a big library at home. i am a museum tour guide. i love to drink fancy tea.
